page.title: 18FOOTPATHS
page.content: The area provides a wealth of opportunities for walkers.It is criss- crossed with paths varying from wide bridle paths & metalled roads to very narrow overgrown tracks.Sign posts are plentiful particularly for those paths which lie in the County of Leicestershire and many of the paths are well trodden. Some paths are difficult to trace to their conclusion & not all the farmers welcome visitors; some actually discourage them by covering footpath signs or planting over the paths. But for those walkers who do manage to find their way,the gently undulating landscape will provide a variety of pleasurable walks.
